Uses of Interface
nl.tno.stormcv.operation.IOperation

  • Packages that use IOperation 
    Package Description
    nl.tno.stormcv.fetcher  
    nl.tno.stormcv.operation  

    • Uses of IOperation in nl.tno.stormcv.fetcher

      Constructors in nl.tno.stormcv.fetcher with parameters of type IOperation 
      Constructor and Description
      FetchAndOperateFetcher(IFetcher fetcher, IOperation operation)
      Instantiate an FetchAndOperateFetcher by providing the Fetcher an Operation to be used.

    • Uses of IOperation in nl.tno.stormcv.operation

      Subinterfaces of IOperation in nl.tno.stormcv.operation 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      interface  IBatchOperation<Output extends CVParticle>
      Interface for batch operations which take a list with CVParticle objects as input instead of a single object as ISingleInputOperation requires.
      interface  ISingleInputOperation<Output extends CVParticle>
      Interface for IOperation's that work on a single CVParticle as input.
      Classes in nl.tno.stormcv.operation that implement IOperation 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  ColorHistogramOp
      Operation to calculate the color histogram of a Frame and returns a Feature with a histogram per color channel.
      class  DrawFeaturesOp
      Draws the features contained within a Frame on the image itself and is primarily used for testing purposes.
      class  FeatureCombinerOp
      A batch operation that wraps multiple Feature objects from multiple bolts in a single Frame without an image.
      class  FeatureExtractionOp
      An operation used to detect and describe a wide variety of features using the OpenCV FeatureExtraction and DescriptorExtractor functions.
      class  FrameGrouperOp
      A IBatchOperation that simply puts all Frame objects it gets within the execute method in a single GroupOfFrames object.
      class  GrayscaleOp
      A simple operation that converts the image within received Frame objects to gray using Java's native ColorConvertOp.
      class  GroupOfFramesOp
      A special ISingleInputOperation that executes a IBatchOperation on Frame objects contained in a single received GroupOfFrames.
      class  HaarCascadeOp
      Detects Haar Cascades in frames/images using OpenCV's CascadeClassifier.
      class  MjpegStreamingOp
      A BatchInputBolt primarily used for testing that creates its own simple webservice used to view results MJPEG streams.
      class  OpenCVOp<Output extends CVParticle>
      Abstract class containing basic functionality to load (custom) OpenCV libraries.
      class  OpticalFlowOp
      Operation to calculate the optical flow between two Frames and returns a Feature with the detected dense optical flow.
      class  ROIExtractionOp
      Extracts Region's Of Interest from Frame's it receives.
      class  ScaleImageOp
      Scales an image into a new image.
      class  SequentialFrameOp
      An operation that executes a provided set of ISingleInputOperation<Frame> sequentially for each Frame it receives.
      class  TilesRecombinerOp
      The TilesRecombinerOperation combines a set of tiles (Frame objects) originating from the same frame.
      class  TilingOp
      This Operation splits a provided frame/image into a configured number of rectangular tiles.
